title: Play-Based Instructional Design Project for Digital Tool Development in Early Childhood Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theories, experience with digital learning tools, and participation in project-based learning
context.additional_context: A course exploring strategies for designing and implementing digital tools in constrained technological environments centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: A framework can be developed to analyze play-based learning elements in digital tools for early childhood mathematics education
A prototype of a mathematics education app optimized for limited technological environments (smartphones) can be designed
Digital play-based learning activities linked to the curriculum can be planned, and an evaluation system can be structured

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
